description: Stack the ultimate burger with Woolworths lean pork mince and Heinz Tomato Ketchup for a flavour extravaganza!
name: Monster Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pork mince, breadcrumbs, garlic, spring onion and 2 tbs Heinz Tomato Ketchup in a large bowl. Shape mixture into 4 patties and place on a large plate. Refrigerate for 20 minutes or until firm.
Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook patties for 5 minutes each side, until cooked through.
Meanwhile, trim one side of each cheese slice in a zigzag pattern to create sharp teeth.
Place bun base on a board. Top each with lettuce, a patty, cheese and sliced tomato. Drizzle with half the remaining Heinz Tomato Ketchup. Sandwich with bun tops.
Using the picture as a guide, arrange 2 cherry tomato halves and 2 olive halves on each bun top. Using toothpicks, secure in place to create eyes. Serve with remaining Heinz Tomato Ketchup.
